entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
